bibl.title: Dying like a Queen. The Story of Cleopatra and the Asp(s) in Antiquity.
bibl.note: Asp as symbol. - The politics of suicide and Horace's Odes 1.37. - Suicide as melodrama: Cleopatra and poison. - Narratives of death: Plutarch and Galen. - Epilegomenon and Chaucer.
bibl.seg: Gurval Robert A., Dying like a Queen. The Story of Cleopatra and the Asp(s) in Antiquity.
Margaret M. Miles (Ed.), Cleopatra. A Sphinx Revisited (Berkeley, 2011) pp. 54-77, figg. 7-9.
Asp as symbol. - The politics of suicide and Horace's Odes 1.37. - Suicide as melodrama: Cleopatra and poison. - Narratives of death: Plutarch and Galen. - Epilegomenon and Chaucer.
